scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @today-red-note/types run build && pnpm -r --parallel --stream run dev
scripts.dev:server: pnpm --filter @today-red-note/types run build && pnpm --filter server run dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @today-red-note/types run build && pnpm -r --filter=!@today-red-note/types run build
scripts.build:client: pnpm --filter @today-red-note/types run build && pnpm --filter client run build
scripts.build:server: pnpm --filter @today-red-note/types run build && pnpm --filter server run build
